advancement.botaniacombat:mjolnir.desc:
Under the tempest's rage, where lightning dances free,
defeat Guardian II, to witness Thor's gift to thee.
advancement.botaniacombat:svalinn.desc:
Legend tells of a shield that reflects the sun,
defeat Guardian II on high to obtain one.
advancement.botaniacombat:skadi_bow.desc:
While protecting your feet from powdered snow
defeat Guardian II, and find Skaði's giant bow.
botaniacombat.page.slaughtersaw0: Keeping livestock is one of the oldest and most reliable sources of nutrition. The $(item)Slaughtersaw$() can expedite the slaughtering process by instantly and painlessly killing livestock the moment it makes contact.$(br)This high-damage effect only works on creatures that drop $(item)meat$(0), being that they are energy-dense. It is of little use on creatures that aren't edible.
botaniacombat.page.slaughtersaw1: Less cruel than repeatedly whacking it with a sword
botaniacombat.page.gaia_greatsword0: It is possible to use the power of $(item)Terrasteel$(0) and $(item)Gaia Spirits$(0)$(br)in tandem as long as the Spirits do not directly make contact with the Terrasteel.Because $(item)Gaia Spreaders$(0) have an outer layer of $(item)Dreamwood$(0), it is possible to attach them to Terrasteel and keep the Gaia energy separate. By forging three $(item)Terra Blades$(0) together and affixing four $(item)Gaia Spreaders$(0), a massive, daunting greatsword is made.
botaniacombat.page.gaia_greatsword2: Since the $(item)Gaia Greatsword$(0) is very heavy, it takes a great deal of effort and time to swing. A user of the $(item)Gaia Greatsword$(0) must take care to have enough "wind-up" time before getting too close to assailants.
botaniacombat.tagline.gaiaGifts: Weapons of beings long since past
botaniacombat.page.gaiaGifts: Given the $(l:alfhomancy/gaia_ritual_hardmode)$(thing)Gaia Guardian II$(0)$(/l) is known to drop $(l:alfhomancy/relic_info)$(thing)Dice of Fate$(0)$(/l), it is clear it holds the essence of beings from an age since past. Perhaps if you were to defeat it under certain conditions, it would grant you replicas of the weapons used by such entities.
botaniacombat.page.mjolnir0: $(item)Mjölnir$() is the hammer of Thor, forged by dwarf brothers, Eitri and Brokkr. Although it was designed to be a hammer, the handle ended up being shorter, making it swing like a mace instead.$(br2)It functions similarly to the $(l:ender/thunder_sword)$(thing)Thundercaller$(0)$(/l), but with a larger electricity range, mob-hopping cap, and damage output at the cost of slower swing speed.
botaniacombat.page.mjolnir1: Right-click to summon a lightning bolt at the cost of some $(thing)mana$(). Be careful with this power, however, as you may be in range to be electrocuted by the very lightning bolt you summoned. This lightning will shatter connected $(l:tools/rainbow_rod)$(thing)Bifrost$(0)$(/l) blocks (at the cost of even more $(thing)mana$()), just as Thor did eons ago.
botaniacombat.tagline.manasteel_shield: Small shield made out of Manasteel
botaniacombat.page.manasteel_shield0: The $(item)Manasteel Buckler$() is a small, $(thing)Mana-using$(0) shield. With its compactness, it enables you to swing faster than you would be able to with a normal shield. Banners cannot be attached to it.
botaniacombat.page.manasteel_shield1: Don't ask how swinging without a shield is slower than swinging with this
botaniacombat.page.elementium_banner_shi: The $(item)Elementium Shield$() is a standard-sized shield with the benefit of increasing your pixie spawn chance while it is being wielded.$(br2)Successfully blocking with the Elementium Shield has a chance to spawn a pixie, just like if you had been damaged.
botaniacombat.page.terrasteel_shield0: Shields are useful for protecting yourself from projectiles, but can't prevent you from getting cornered... Unless your shield is a $(item)Terra Tower Shield$(). To perform a Shield Bash while wielding one, begin blocking while sneaking. This will consume some $(thing)mana$() and send foes in front of you back.
botaniacombat.page.terrasteel_shield1: I wanna push you around$(br)Well, I will, well, I will
botaniacombat.page.terrasteel_shield2: The Shield Bash uses absorbed knockback; that is, the more knockback resistance you have, the more knockback will be applied to foes. Paired with a full set of $(l:tools/terrasteel_armor)$(item)Terrasteel Armor$(0)$(/l), it can send your enemies 20 or more blocks away!
botaniacombat.page.svalinn0: Svalinn is a shield that protects the world (or, more specifically, Midgard -- what seems to be known as the "overworld") from the sun. In the same way that the $(l:tools/terrasteel_shield)$(item)Terra Tower Shield$(0)$(/l) takes in knockback and deflects it during a Shield Bash, Svalinn takes in heat from the sun to burn enemies.
botaniacombat.page.svalinn1: How long enemies burn for is dependent on how high in the sky the sun is, and there will be no ignition if used during the darkest hours of the night.$(br2)It will also grant its user temporary immunity to fire at the cost of some $(thing)mana$(), should they come into contact with heat.
botaniacombat.tagline.livingwood_crossbo: A crossbow that regenerates using Mana
botaniacombat.page.livingwood_crossbow0: The Livingwood Crossbow is the $(l:tools/livingwood_bow)$(item)Livingwood Bow$(0)$(/l) to the mundane Crossbow. That is to say, it works like a Crossbow does, but repairs itself with mana.
botaniacombat.page.livingwood_crossbow1: This one doesn't shoot airplanes either
botaniacombat.tagline.crystal_crossbow: A fast crossbow that creates arrows from Mana
botaniacombat.page.crystal_crossbow0: The Crystal Crossbow is the crossbow equivalent to the $(l:tools/crystal_bow)$(item)Crystal Bow$(0)$(/l). When charged, instead of conjuring an arrow, it stores the energy until the trigger is pulled, at which point the arrow is manifested. It is slightly more accurate than your standard crossbow.$(br)Should it be enchanted with $(thing)Multishot$(), the angle of the multiplied projectiles will be slightly wider.
botaniacombat.page.skadi_bow0: Long, long ago, a jötunn by the name of Skaði skied down snowy mountains and hunted game. Her bow had the ability to nearly freeze her prey in place for a moment, which was just enough time to deliver the killing blow.$(br2)Skaði's Bow freely converts mundane arrows into Arrows of Slowness IV when fired.
botaniacombat.page.skadi_bow1: Being a larger bow, any arrow fired from it will have greater power than a standard bow, resulting in greater damage. When enchanted with Infinity, Skaði's Bow does not require arrows at all. It will still consume non-mundane arrows.$(br2)Unusual for a bow is the fang-like structures near its arrow rest, which will cause foes smacked with it to become inflicted with cold as if they were standing in $(item)Powdered Snow$() at the cost of a minimal amount of $(thing)mana$().
botaniacombat.tagline.angry_bozu: just a glimpse into my dark reality.
botaniacombat.page.angry_bozu0: This fella is an angry, erratic upgrade to the $(item)Teru Teru Bozu$(). It retains the ability to clear the skies, but it would prefer you summon a storm by giving it a $(item)Wither Rose$().$(br2)Placing a $(item)Redstone Comparator$() adjacent will allow it to detect thunderstorms.
botaniacombat.page.angry_bozu1: haha. just a glimpse into my dark reality.
botaniacombat.page.damageLens: A $(l:botania:tools/mana_blaster)Mana Blaster$() with a Damage Lens attached is affected by Ranged Damage bonuses. Unlike other ranged weapons, a Blaster with such a lens seems to deal magic damage, bypassing armor.
text.autoconfig.botaniacombat.title: BotaniaCombat config (Requires Restart)
